lead_paragraph: David Tyree's retirement on Friday was an occasion to look back at what some call the greatest play in N.F.L. history.
snippet: David Tyree's retirement with the Giants is an occasion to look back at what some people call the greatest play in N.F.L. history.
abstract: David Tyree's retirement with the Giants is an occasion to look back at what some people call the greatest play in N.F.L. history.
